description: Creates a case in the Support Center.
mitreAttackSubTechniques: T1578.005 - Modify Cloud Compute Infrastructure: Modify Cloud Account Settings

incidents.description: From Compromised Keys to Phishing Campaigns: Inside a Cloud Email Service Takeover

securityImplications: Attackers might use CreateCase to create a support case to try to get bigger quotas or other changes to the AWS account.

simulation.value: aws support create-case --subject "API Test Case" --service-code "general-info" --severity-code "low" --category-code "using-aws" --communication-body "This is only a test of the AWS Support Create Case API." --issue-type "technical"
